alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jefferson, Taylor and southern Madison Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles southeast of Monticello to 12 miles southwest of Perry. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Ebb, Secotan, Boyd, Smith, Hopewell, Carbur, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Econfina, Lake Bird, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction and Athena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison
